data.text: @tarheelupdate Would we have a scholarship available? I think Covid seniors didn’t could against scholarship counts this season.  Is that true for next season as well?
@tarheelupdate Would LOVE to have him back.

@tarheelupdate I don’t blame him! He is only now getting the love and respect he deserves from Tar Heel Nation! The key board warriors are relentless with the derogatory comments. How about showing him some love and lifting him up and giving him incentive to stay ONE MORE YEAR??🏀🐏👣
@tarheelupdate Please Leaky stay I will miss you
